intro.title: The Creative
intro.paragraph1: I'm Nicky Bruno, and I represent the evolution of creative professionals—where traditional design meets cutting-edge AI automation. I don't just choose between creativity or technology; I master both.
intro.paragraph2: For over two decades, I've been crafting intelligent experiences that think, adapt, and evolve. I'm not just building websites—I'm architecting digital experiences that bridge human intuition with machine precision.
intro.paragraph3: Based in Montreal's vibrant tech scene, I bring a unique blend of bilingual culture and North American innovation to every project. My approach is visionary yet grounded, technically masterful yet creatively inspired.

experience.content: With a background spanning web development, UX design, and AI integration, I bring a unique perspective to every project. I've worked with startups, established businesses, and everything in between, always focusing on solutions that deliver real value.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.content: I believe technology should serve people, not the other way around. That's why I focus on creating solutions that are not only technically sound but also intuitive and accessible. Every project starts with understanding your goals and ends with a solution that exceeds your expectations.
